executable.description: Extracts features/screenshots by flying around a 3D object.

double.name: sphereRadius
double.label: Shpere radius
double.description: Sphere radius to take the snapshots of the object

integer.name: numberOfSubdivisions
integer.label: Sphere subdivisions
integer.description: Number of recursive subdivisions for the sphere

integer.name: numberOfSpiralSamples
integer.label: Spiral path samples
integer.description: Number of samples following a spiral path on the sphere

integer.name: numberOfSpiralTurns
integer.label: Spiral turns
integer.description: Number of turns performed by the spiral

integer.name: planeResolution
integer.label: Resolution
integer.description: Number of samples/size for the plane tanget to the sphere

double.name: planeScaleFactor
double.label: Plane scale factor
double.description: Scaling factor for the tangent plane

string.name: regionLabels
string.label: Region labels
string.description: Array name that contains the labels for every point in the surface

boolean.name: flyByCompose
boolean.label: Compose image with sequence
boolean.description: Compose a volume with the fly-by extraction

double.name: maxMagnitude
double.label: Scaling factor for the shape so it's inside the unit sphere
double.description: If you want to scale a whole population of objects by the same magnitude

boolean.name: centerOfMass
boolean.label: Use Center of Mass
boolean.description: Use the center of mass of the object instead of the mean point

boolean.name: randomRotation
boolean.label: Random rotation
boolean.description: Apply a random rotation to the shape

boolean.name: applyRotation
boolean.label: Apply rotation
boolean.description: Apply the rotation specified by the rotationAngle and rotationVector

boolean.name: fiberBundle
boolean.label: Fiber bundle
boolean.description: Set if it is a fiber bundle

boolean.name: curvature
boolean.label: Compute curvatures filter
boolean.description: Compute curvatures filter on the input mesh, for visualization purposes only

integer.name: visualizeIndexStopCriteria
integer.label: Point index
integer.description: Index of the point in the spiral or on the icosahedron sphere subdivision

integer.name: visualizeTreeLevel
integer.label: Visualize cell locator subdivision
integer.description: Index of the octree subdivision level

boolean.name: useOctree
boolean.label: Use octree algorithm to generate the flyby
boolean.description: Use an octree to locate cells instead of the rendering engine (slow algorithm)
